title: Happy landing (TEFC)
creator_credit: Open University, BBC-TV and Clive Holloway
brief_description: The program aims to show how the problems posed by ‘real world’ perceptual tasks (for example landing an aircraft) may lead to a different kind of perceptual theory than that normally generated by laboratory experiments. NB. Tape blank for first minute.
